attributes.action: reduce the legal age of buying cigarettes to 14
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
many teenagers smoke at the age of 14 and many people buy them for the younger ones so why not reduce the age and then less people would be done for supplying to younger people and then maybe less people would smoke
as a smoker myself i find it very hard to find someone to buy them and it would reduce the amount of violence aswell because people would be able to get them easily and then would be less stressed
